thread.title: India's end-June external debt rises to $482.9 billion: RBI
thread.title_full: India's end-June external debt rises to $482.9 billion: RBI

title: India's end-June external debt rises to $482.9 billion: RBI
text: ET SPECIAL: Love visual aspect of news? Enjoy this exclusive slideshows treat! MUMBAI: India's end-June external debt was at $482.9 billion, up $8.5 billion from March-end, the Reserve Bank of India said in a release on Wednesday. The increase in the external debt was mainly due to higher non-resident Indian deposits and commercial borrowings, the RBI said. The share of short-term debt residual maturity to India's forex reserves stood at 51.9 per cent from 54.2 per cent end-March, the RBI said.
